name: BabyBedtimeLullabies
0:
”Alexa, play Baby Bedtime skill.”
”Alexa, ask Baby Bedtime to start.”
”Alexa, open Baby Bedtime skill.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baby bedtime
des:
Baby Bedtime plays soothing lullabies to help children relax and get to sleep.

The following lullabies are available:

• Moon and Little Stars
• Baby Sleep
• Brahms Music Box
• Two hour Lullaby


ROUTINES:
You can also automatically start the lullabies by adding a daily routine. To add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:

• In the Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
• Click + to add a new routine.
• Click "Rename" and enter a suitable name.
• Click + for "Add an event" and choose one ("Schedule" for a daily, time based routine).
• Click + for "Add an action" and choose "Skills".
• Choose "Your Skills" then select "Baby Bedtime Lullabies" from the list ( you may have to scroll down some way).
• Choose a Device to play the lullabies from and then click 'Save'.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
